metadata.title: CVE-2023-52436 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:explicitly null-terminate the xattr list When setting an xattr, explicitlynull-terminate the xattr list. This eliminates the fragile assumption thatthe unused xattr space is always zeroed.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
